message:
SYSTEM: 05_OWL.pdf: Página 25
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
29
OWL 2
OWL (1.0 and 1.1)
February 2004
Web Ontology Language
Built on top of RDF(S) and renaming DAML+OIL primitives
Three layers:
- OWL Lite
- A small subset of primitives
- Easier for frame-based tools to transition to
- OWL DL
- Description logic
- Decidable reasoning
- OWL Full
- RDF extension, allows metaclasses
Several syntaxes:
- Abstract syntax
- Manchester syntax
- RDF/XML
speaker: SYSTEM
